author: ehillenius
msg: Removed final from getSessionAttributePrefix so that users could provide their own implementation, e.g. to share session objects. I didn't actually test that this works, but I see no reason why it wouldn't.

author: carnold
msg: Add rewrites for log4j/docs/api and all log4j/docs/*.html and log4j/docs/*.txt

author: jonesde
msg: Small format change only in TransactionUtil; in EntityDataAssert fixed a couple of NPE cases and improved to make much more robust

author: bodewig
msg: Make each mvn build use a local repository of its own

msg: Modify SJAS9 DDs so they do not interfere with DayTrader 1.2 deployment on Geronimo 2.0.1
